description: Unit test module for assessment-related API endpoints in a FastAPI application, using TestClient and monkeypatching to mock service behavior.

classes.name: _FakeAssessmentsService
classes.description: Mock service class used for testing assessment APIs, with methods to simulate listing, creating, and retrieving assessments.

methods.name: test_assessments_list_ok_with_pagination
methods.description: Tests the GET /assessments endpoint for successful retrieval with pagination parameters.

methods.name: test_assessments_create_returns_201
methods.description: Tests the POST /assessments endpoint for successful creation of an assessment.

methods.name: test_assessments_get_not_found
methods.description: Tests the GET /assessments/{assessment_id} endpoint for handling non-existent assessment (404 error).
